titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of Take Our Daughters and Sons To Work Day.
A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of Take Our Daughters and Sons To Work Day.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Recognizes the goals of introducing our daughters and sons to the workplace. Commends participants of Take Our Daughters And Sons To Work Day.
